unnormalised: Paytm announced a massive cashback offer of â‚¹200 for first-time users making UPI transactions. The offer is valid till 31/12/2024 and applies to transactions above Rs. 50. Sources say this is to compete with PhonePe and Google Pay.
normalised: Paytm announced a massive cashback offer of rupee two hundred for first time users making U-P-I transactions. The offer is valid till thirty first december two thousand and twenty four and applies to transactions above rupees fifty. Sources say this is to compete with PhonePe and Google Pay.

unnormalised: Apparently, this initiative is aimed at onboarding new users, especially in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities. Cashback will be credited directly to the user's Paytm wallet within 24 hrs of the transaction. Users can also avail additional discounts of up to Rs. 500 on select e-commerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon by using the code "PAYTMNEW."
normalised: Apparently, this initiative is aimed at onboarding new users, especially in Tier two and Tier three cities. Cashback will be credited directly to the user's Paytm wallet within twenty four hours of the transaction. Users can also avail additional discounts of up to rupees five hundred on select e-commerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon by using the code "PAYTMNEW."

unnormalised: Analysts predict this move will significantly boost Paytm's user base in the coming months. "We expect a 20-25% increase in new users," said Mr. Rajesh Kumar, a financial analyst. Let's see if it works, right?
normalised: Analysts predict this move will significantly boost Paytm's user base in the coming months. "We expect a twenty to twenty five percent increase in new users," said Mister Rajesh Kumar, a financial analyst. Let's see if it works, right?
